section.p: The common notion of "procedure" is broader than that specified by the HL7 Version 3 Reference Information Model (RIM). Therefore procedure templates can be represented with various RIM classes: act (e.g., dressing change), observation (e.g., EEG), procedure (e.g. splenectomy). This clinical statement represents procedures whose immediate and primary outcome (post-condition) is the alteration of the physical condition of the patient. Examples of these procedures are an appendectomy, hip replacement and a creation of a gastrostomy.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PROC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7652)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 MoodCodeEvnInt STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:7653)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7655)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:7656)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 ProcedureActStatusCode DYNAMIC (CONF:7661)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7662)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] specimen (CONF:7697)
This specimen is for representing specimens obtained from a procedure.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] serviceDeliveryLocation (CONF:7767)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:7718)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] medicationActivity (CONF:7888)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] patientInstruction (CONF:7778)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] indication (CONF:7781)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 ActPriority STATIC (CONF:7668)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:7670)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 Body Site Value Set STATIC 2 (CONF:7683)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] procedureEncounter (CONF:7770)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] productInstance (CONF:7754)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Product Instance (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.37)

code in a procedure activity SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12), ICD9 Procedures (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.104), ICD10 Procedure Coding System (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) (CONF:7657)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:7658)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:7659)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:7660)
methodCode SHALL NOT conflict with the method inherent in Procedure / code (CONF:7890)
entryRelationship with target entry encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8009)
participant with target entry Product Instance SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DEV" Device (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:7752)
participant with target entry Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:7766)
entryRelationship with target entry Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:7777)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PROC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7652)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 ActPriority STATIC (CONF:7668)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 Body Site Value Set STATIC 2 (CONF:7683)
